summary: Frontend UI testing for redesigned lesson page action buttons completed. All 10 features tested and working correctly. The lesson page now has a cleaner, more modern layout with Primary Actions row (Print, Export & Share dropdown, Calendar, Export, Expand, Notes) and Interactive Tools row (Scripture Lookup, Map, Quiz, Supplies).

minor.issue: Returns 401 unauthorized - requires authentication. This is expected behavior for protected API endpoints.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Lesson page action buttons redesign verified. All buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing.

print_lesson_button.notes: Opens print preview in new window with formatted lesson content

export_share_dropdown.notes: Dropdown opens correctly and shows all 4 export options

add_to_calendar.notes: Opens calendar modal with Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar options, date/time pickers, and Create Event button

export_button.notes: Opens Export Lesson modal with PDF and Word format options, plus 'Export as PDF' button

expand_collapse_toggle.notes: Button toggles between 'Expand All' and 'Collapse' states, expands/collapses all lesson sections

teacher_notes_toggle.notes: Shows/hides Teacher Notes & Tips section with numbered tips

scripture_lookup_button.notes: Opens Scripture Lookup drawer with search input, translation options (KJV, WEB, BBE, OEB-US), common references, and full Bible text display with verse numbers

map_toggle.notes: Shows/hides Biblical Geography Map section with 'Extract Locations from Lesson' button

quiz_toggle.notes: Shows/hides Quiz Generator section with 'Get Started' button for AI-generated quizzes

supplies_toggle.notes: Shows/hides AI Supply List section with 'Extract Supply List' button

primary_actions_row.layout: Horizontal flex with gap-3, buttons have consistent styling

interactive_tools_row.label: INTERACTIVE TOOLS
interactive_tools_row.layout: Separate row with uppercase label, toggle buttons change color when active

verification_summary.visual_verification: Screenshots confirm redesigned button layout is cleaner and more modern
